title: How to Rob a Bank in Godfather Blackhand Edition

steps.headline: If you want to pull of a successful bank robbery you'll need the supplies.
First off, you'll need a car, a stick of dynamite, a shotgun, and Tommy gun.
Easy Bank: When you walk into the bank there will be a small room.
To the right is the room with the cash.
Go up to the guard you see first and start strangling him.
Then go to a place where you can see the safe.
You will see two guards.
steps.description: Strangle the one on the left first because he tends to shoot first then ask questions. The guard on the right will take out his club and start hitting you.

steps.headline: After killing the guard on the left, start beating up the guard on the right.
Now hurry up and plant the dynamite.
steps.description: Get a good distance away from it.

steps.headline: After it explodes, Take out your Tommy gun, get the cash inside the safe, get ALL the cash and hide behind something.
3-5 cops will come in with guns.
steps.description: Shoot them all with your Tommy gun and equip your shotgun. When you open the door a cop will probably be there. Don't think and shoot!

steps.headline: Outside there will be a whole bunch of cops and cop cars.
steps.description: Hijack one of the cars and drive to the nearest safe house! Hooray you got your cash!

steps.headline: Hard bank: when you go in there will be a guard.
He will go into the door at your left (the double door).
Equip your garrote wire.
From behind, before he gets to the door, strangle or break his neck.
Now go to the door.
steps.description: When you go inside take a right immediately.

steps.headline: You will see two sets of stairs.
steps.description: Go to the on leading down.

steps.headline: Take out your shotgun, shoot everyone, and the metal door you see will be unlocked.
Plant the dynamite and take a right.
steps.description: there will be a small room with some cash. Take out your Shotgun and get out the room.

steps.headline: Get ALL the cash inside the safe and RUN!
steps.description: If any guards/cops show up, don't think just shoot!

steps.headline: When your up the stairs take a right.
steps.description: Then take another right. There will be a door. Then there might be a parked car. Get in and drive to the nearest safe house.

steps.headline: If there is no car, go out the gate and hijack a cop car.

text: If you want to pull of a successful bank robbery you'll need the supplies.  First off, you'll need a car, a stick of dynamite, a shotgun, and Tommy gun.  Easy Bank: When you walk into the bank there will be a small room.  To the right is the room with the cash.  Go up to the guard you see first and start strangling him.  Then go to a place where you can see the safe.  You will see two guards. Strangle the one on the left first because he tends to shoot first then ask questions. The guard on the right will take out his club and start hitting you. After killing the guard on the left, start beating up the guard on the right.  Now hurry up and plant the dynamite. Get a good distance away from it. After it explodes, Take out your Tommy gun, get the cash inside the safe, get ALL the cash and hide behind something.  3-5 cops will come in with guns. Shoot them all with your Tommy gun and equip your shotgun. When you open the door a cop will probably be there. Don't think and shoot! Outside there will be a whole bunch of cops and cop cars. Hijack one of the cars and drive to the nearest safe house! Hooray you got your cash! Hard bank: when you go in there will be a guard.  He will go into the door at your left (the double door).  Equip your garrote wire.  From behind, before he gets to the door, strangle or break his neck.  Now go to the door. When you go inside take a right immediately. You will see two sets of stairs. Go to the on leading down. Take out your shotgun, shoot everyone, and the metal door you see will be unlocked.  Plant the dynamite and take a right. there will be a small room with some cash. Take out your Shotgun and get out the room. Get ALL the cash inside the safe and RUN! If any guards/cops show up, don't think just shoot! When your up the stairs take a right. Then take another right. There will be a door. Then there might be a parked car. Get in and drive to the nearest safe house. If there is no car, go out the gate and hijack a cop car.
